title: Appetite for Reduction: 125 Fast and Filling Low-Fat Vegan Recip
description:

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œA snappy cookbook that embraces whole plant foods without a sugary snack in sight. Those avoiding gluten or soy will appreciate the numerous gluten-free and soy-free recipes, and everyone is sure to learn something from the preparation and nutrition tips [Moskowitz] sprinkles throughout the book. Best of all, her recipes for goodies such as OMG Oven-Banked Onion Rings, Tamarind BBQ Tempeh & Sweet Potatoes, and Chipotle Lentil Burgers will make even dedicated carnivores appreciate the pleasures of plant-based meals.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

The results are tasty dishes with no guilt attached.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

Oh and the portions are real, too! None of these ridiculous tiny serving sizes to get the low calorie counts. These are real servings folks!ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

Appetite for ReductionÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦will knock your socks off, just in time for a great Christmas gift for omnivores or vegans alike and strengthen some of those New YearÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s resolutionsÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦Easy-to-follow directions, well-organized chapters, [and] gorgeous art direction and helpful tipsÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦The icons that designate quick-to-prepare, gluten- and soy-free recpies make this cookbook especially user-friendlyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦Appetite for Reduction casts its culinary net wideÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦The recipes span the globe and include rare treats calorie-conscious diners usually donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t get to enjoyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦Appetite for Reduction gives lots of creative, easy and tasty opportunities to eat healthfullyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦A very worthwhile edition to anyoneÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s cookbook collection.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

Appetite refers also to environmental impact, animal cruelty, and your bank account.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

VegNews, February 2011
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œFrom the grand dame of vegan cookbooks, Appetite doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t leave you hungryÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦From salads that satisfy like meals to hearty pasta dishes to every vegetable imaginable, Appetite doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t miss a beatÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦Unlike other diet books, Appetite isnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t about dropping 20 pounds in a weekend; itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s about eating healthfully in a way that can lead to weight loss without resorting to drastic measuresÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½measures which Moskowitz assures are guaranteed to pile pounds right back on.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

While all recipes are between 200 and 400 calories per serving, each is loaded with delicious, vibrant flavor.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œIt moves along like a well-oiled machine, starting with salads and continuing with side dishes, beans (a mainstay of this type of cooking), tofu and tempeh, soups, stews and more...It contains solid information and a variety of recipes that vegans will find tasty.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

BBC Good Food (UK), February 2011
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œThis is a vegan diet book, but forget your preconceptions and look at the food. Her book is worth buying for the salad dressings alone.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

While offering plenty of tips for novice vegans, MoskowitzÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s recipes are interesting and flavorful enough to delight seasoned meatless mavens, too.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

Portland Oregonian, 1/25/11
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œLeave it to innovative cookbook author Isa Chandra Moskowitz, the co-author of Veganomicon, to come up with a collection of 125 low-fat recipes that won't have you leaving the table hungryÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦Moskowitz's writing style is accessible and fun, and she demystifies ingredients like tempeh and tofuÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦Every recipe has detailed nutritional analysis, including vitamin content, something too many diet cookbooks don't bother with.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½
 
The Hippo, 1/20/11
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œAs with previous Moskowitz books, one thing not sacrificed is flavor. She plays with Asian, Mediterranean, Indian and Latin cuisine with her recipes in ways that make you feel like youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re not losing ta...
Product Description

This is not your motherÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s low-fat cookbook. ThereÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s no foolish tricks, no bizarre concoctions, no chemicals, no frozen mealsÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦no fake anything! Appetite for Reduction means cooking with real food, for real life. (Skimpy portions need not apply.)
 
In Appetite for Reduction, bestselling author and vegan chef Isa Chandra Moskowitz has created 125 delectable, nutritionally-balanced recipes for the foods you craveÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½lasagna, tacos, barbecue, curries, stews, and much moreÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½and itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s all:

    * Only 200 to 400 calories per serving
    * Plant-based and packed with nutrients
    * Low in saturated fat and sugar; high in fiber
    * Drop-dead delicious

YouÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll also find lots of gluten-free and soy-free options, and best of all, dinner can be on the table in less than 30 minutes. So ditch those diet shakes. Skip that lemonade cleanse. And fight for your right to eat something satisfying! Now you can look better, feel better, and have more energyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½for health at any size.
